prompts.title: Example Prompts
prompts.lead: A collection of example prompts for ChatGPT to create your profile.

steps.copy: Copy the prompt below using the "Copy Prompt" button.
steps.open: Open ChatGPT and start a new conversation.
steps.paste: Paste the prompt into the chat.
steps.use: Copy the JSON output from ChatGPT's response in this page.
